entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:52 AM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 08:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 73 %

Dewpoint: -16.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 this morning then steady.
